message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with communication networks and machine-to-machine communication applications, which are typically studied in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the issue of adapting the data acquisition process to the needs of the application, which is related to the field of Systems and Control (cs.SY). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of sensing and remote data bases, which are common in the field of Multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper discusses the optimal trade-off between communication rates, distortions, and costs, which is related to the field of Machine Learning (cs.LG).
